ai-patthana16.19:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.19:0.3_0: Seeing that for a wholesome mind,
ai-patthana16.19:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a good principle.
ai-patthana16.19:1.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a good principle.
ai-patthana16.19:1.1_2: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to mental predominances. Mindfulness arises dependent on the mind.
ai-patthana16.19:1.1_3: Skillful thoughts, mind is not overcome by principle, and with mind, and no cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.19:1.1_4: A skillful mind gives rise to a thought. It is not skilled in intentions or a mind. Five things don’t arise for them, or for five reasons.
ai-patthana16.19:2.1_3: Unskillful mind, causes unskillful qualities to beset by thought, nor with mental intentions, and no reason.
ai-patthana16.19:3.1_2: Not corrupting mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, or mind. ... They’re not skilled in loss of thought or cause or reason. And they don’t give rise to a cause or reason for these three things.
ai-patthana16.19:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
